articles.title: ‘After April 26…’: PM Modi takes digs at Rahul Gandhi, 'Rajya Sabha member' Sonia Gandhi - Hindustan Times
articles.description: In an interview with Asianet News Network, PM Narendra Modi said Rahul Gandhi took shelter in Wayanad after losing Amethi.  | Latest News India
articles.content: Lok Sabha election 2024 news: Taking potshots at the Congress for not announcing its candidate for the Amethi seat in the 2024 Lok Sabha election yet, Prime Minister Narendra Modi has predicted that … [+5077 chars]
